resources.string: Mt.Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
Sydney is the capital of Australia.
Eyes are only organs in our body which do not grow.
Antarctica is the driest place in the world.
Thomas Edison was the inventor of alternating current.
London has the longest life expectancy.
North America and Russia are separated by a distance of only 4 kilometers.
Bill Gates is the richest man in the world.
Steve Jobs the founder of Apple has no idea about coding.
